column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Gaby - Thank you for the great review. I'm very pleased to know you enjoyed our ramen. I would like to suggest any of our three "dry noodle" dishes that do not contain broth: Tan Tan Men
column2: Mazemen or Hiyashi Cold Ramen. In terms of pricing
column3: over the years I have visited dozens of ramen shops worldwide
column4: and I have spent anywhere between $8-$20 for a bowl of ramen. What I have learned is that each ramen shop is unique in its own way -- from the noodles and broth they use
column5: to the side dishes they serve
column6: to the price points they target. Here in Midtown
column7: goods and services tend to be on the pricier side.
